page.title: 19Attitudes: Wembley Stadium
page.content:
Sometimes I hate{Wembley Stadium } because when there is an event like a match on there are nearly always hooligans hanging about. I live near the Stadium and nearly every Saturday there's a match on and lots of people hang about the "Harrow Tavern",which is a public house in front of our house. I hope that Wembley Stadium buy security cameras to catch all the hooligans. The time when I like Wembley is when there are no hooligans and the match is a friendly game. Concerts like the Live Aid one are held there as well. Next to Wembley Stadium,in the car park,there is a market which is held every Sunday.
H.P.( Aged 9yrs)
